channel.title: Tag: mdn - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels and self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: KumaScript: Bringing scripting to the wiki bears
item.description: KumaScript turned one year old back at the end of January, and I’m sad to say no one celebrated its birthday – not even me. I’m pretty sure very few people outside of the core team at the Mozilla Developer Network even know what KumaScript is. So, I guess it’s about time I do something about that.

item.title: On the other end of a self-imposed death march project
item.description: So, I’m a couple of weeks back from a well-deserved vacation taken after the launch of a project well over 18 months in the making. I kind of overworked myself, voluntarily, and that needs to change.
